00002         require_once(dirname(__FILE__) . "/../include/tag_support.inc.php");
00003 
00004         define("LOCALIZATION_DEBUG", 0);
00005 
00010         class Localization
00011         {
00016                 public static $languages = array('it', 'en', 'es');
00017 
00022                 private static $strings_table;
00023         
00029                 public static function localize($term)
00030                 {
00031                         if (!self::$strings_table)
00032                         {
00033                                 self::load_strings_table();
00034                         }
00035                         return self::wrap((array_key_exists($term, self::$strings_table)) ?
00036                                 self::$strings_table[$term] : $term);
00037                 }
00038 
00045                 public static function add_strings_table($controller)
00046                 {
00047                         $table = self::$strings_table;
00048                 
00049                         $local_strings = self::load_strings_file(@$_COOKIE['hl'], $controller);
00050                         $table = array_merge(self::$strings_table, eval("return {$local_strings};"));
00051                 
00052                         self::$strings_table = $table;
00053                 }
00054                 
00060                 private static function wrap($term)
00061                 {
00062                         if (!LOCALIZATION_DEBUG) return $term;
00063                         return span($term, array('class' => 'localization-debug'));
00064                 }
00065         
00072                 private static function load_strings_file($lang = 'en', $controller = NULL)
00073                 {
00074                         $strings_file = $controller ?
00075                                 dirname(__FILE__) . "/../assets/strings/$controller/localizable-$lang.strings" :
00076                                 dirname(__FILE__) . "/../assets/strings/localizable-$lang.strings";
00077                         
00078                         //print_r($strings_file);
00079                 
00080                         if (file_exists($strings_file))
00081                         {
00082                                 return file_get_contents($strings_file);
00083                         }
00084                         else if ($lang != 'en')
00085                         {
00086                                 return self::load_strings_file('en', $controller);
00087                         }
00088                         return "array();";
00089                 }
00090 
00096                 private static function load_strings_table()
00097                 {
00098                         $table = array();
00099                 
00100                         $controller = $_REQUEST['controller'];
00101                 
00102                         $global_strings = self::load_strings_file(@$_COOKIE['hl'] /* GLOBAL */);
00103                         $table = array_merge($table, eval("return {$global_strings}"));
00104                         $local_strings = self::load_strings_file(@$_COOKIE['hl'], $controller);
00105                         $table = array_merge($table, eval("return {$local_strings}"));
00106                 
00107                         self::$strings_table = $table;
00108                 }
00109         }
